stratagems.name: HUNTERS’ TRAIL
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One SPACE WOLVES unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3". When doing so, it does not need to end that move closer to the closest enemy model, provided it ends that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit.

stratagems.name: TERRITORIAL ADVANTAGE
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit is destroyed by an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
stratagems.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
stratagems.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

stratagems.name: OVERWHELMING ONSLAUGHT
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: Two ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, or one SPACE WOLVES BEASTS unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: CHOSEN PREY
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after a SPACE WOLVES unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.target: That SPACE WOLVES unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.name: BOUNDING ADVANCE
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One SPACE WOLVES INFANTRY or SPACE WOLVES BEASTS unit from your army that has not been selected to move or declared a charge this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move, it can move through models (excluding TITANIC models). When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of enemy models, but unless it is making a Charge move, it cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them.

stratagems.name: MARKED FOR DESTRUCTION
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: Two ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army (excluding BEASTS) that have not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit visible to both of your units. Until the end of the phase, models in your units can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target) and each time a model in one of your units makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

stratagems.name: INSPIRING PRESENCE
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

stratagems.name: CHAMPION’S GUIDANCE
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One SPACE WOLVES CHARACTER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: BIRTH OF A SAGA
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One Wolf Guard Headtaker or Wolf Guard Terminator Pack Leader model from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, your model has the CHARACTER keyword.Designer’s Note: While in effect, your model’s unit is therefore a CHARACTER unit, meaning it can interact with the Heroes All rule, in addition to other rules that interact with CHARACTER units.

stratagems.name: ALPHA STRIKE
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.name: HEROIC RESOLVE
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One SPACE WOLVES CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.name: COUNTERCHARGE
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more enemy units and would be eligible to declare a charge against one or more of those enemy units if it were your Charge phase.
stratagems.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only one or more of those enemy units, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase. Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

stratagems.name: UNBRIDLED FEROCITY
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One SPACE WOLVES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: SHOCK CAVALRY
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One THUNDERWOLF CAVALRY unit from your army that has not been selected to move or declared a charge this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move, it can move through models (excluding TITANIC models) and sections of terrain features that are 4" or less in height. When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of enemy models, but unless it is making a Charge move, it cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them.

stratagems.name: PINNING FIRE
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, after your unit has shot, select one enemy CHARACTER, MONSTER, or VEHICLE unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next Shooting phase, that unit is pinned. While a unit is pinned, subtract 2" from its Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for it.

stratagems.name: THUNDEROUS PURSUIT
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6". If your unit has the SPACE WOLVES INFANTRY or THUNDERWOLF CAVALRY keywords, it can make a Normal move of up to 6" instead.

stratagems.name: IMPETUOSITY
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One WULFEN INFANTRY or BLOOD CLAWS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, after that enemy unit has shot, if one or more models in your unit were destroyed as a result of those attacks, your unit can make an Impetuous move. To do so, roll one D6: your unit can be moved a number of inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.

stratagems.name: COORDINATED STRIKE
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One SPACE WOLVES unit from your army that is wholly within 9" of one or more battlefield edges and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.name: PREYTAKER’S EYE
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Select either the [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1] abilities. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have that ability.

stratagems.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: RUNES OF CLAIMING
stratagems.when: End of your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES WALKER unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

stratagems.name: CHILLING HOWL
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Command phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test if that unit is Below Half-strength.

stratagems.name: STALKING WOLVES
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Stealth ability.

stratagems.name: ONRUSHING STORM
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.name: IN THE EMPEROR’S NAME
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES BATTLELINE unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker and was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

stratagems.name: CERAMITE BULWARK
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES BATTLELINE unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Select any number of models in your unit. Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of melee weapons equipped by the selected models and each time you select targets for attacks made by those models, they must target an enemy unit that is wholly on the opposite side of a Hatchway from them.

stratagems.name: DUTY AND DEFIANCE
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if your unit has the BATTLELINE keyword: on a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: VOX-AMPLIFIED ROAR
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army declares a charge.
stratagems.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
stratagems.effect: Each target of that charge must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.name: KNIFE WORK
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1.

stratagems.name: ENHANCED EFFICIENCY
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit is selected to make a Normal or Advance move, it can attempt to operate one Hatchway it is within 1” of either at the start or end of that move. If it does, it cannot attempt to operate a Hatchway again this turn.

stratagems.name: FIGHTING RETREAT
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army is selected to Fall Back.
stratagems.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit and roll one D6: on a 2-4, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 5+, that enemy unit suffers 2 mortal wounds.

stratagems.name: MASTER MARKSMEN
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

stratagems.name: TOWER OF STRENGTH
stratagems.when: Start or end of any phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of your next Command phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit.
stratagems.restrictions: Each time you use this Stratagem, you cannot use it again until after your next Command phase.

stratagems.name: FOCUSING SHRINE
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, at the start of the Reinforcements step.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army that is in Reserves.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, when setting up your unit on the battlefield using its Deep Strike ability, you can set it up unit anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models (measure this distance as you would normally for the Deep Strike ability, ignoring Walls and closed Hatchways).
stratagems.restrictions: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

stratagems.name: CARVE A PATH
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One TERMINATOR ASSAULT SQUAD unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase and has not declared a charge this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, when making a Normal, Advance or Charge move, your unit can move through a single closed Hatchway as if it was open. When doing so, that Hatchway is opened and cannot be closed for the rest of the battle. This can allow that unit to declare a charge against enemy units that are not visible to it, but to do so those enemy units must be within 1" of that Hatchway and wholly on the opposite side of it from your unit.
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem more than once per turn.

stratagems.name: CLEANSING SWEEP
stratagems.when: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One TERMINATOR SQUAD unit from your army that has not fired Overwatch this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack while firing Overwatch, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ is required to score a hit, instead of an unmodified 6.

stratagems.name: ADAPTIVE STRATEGY
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Select the Devastator Doctrine, Tactical Doctrine or Assault Doctrine. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Combat Doctrine is active for that unit instead of any other Combat Doctrine that is active for your army, even if you have already selected that doctrine this battle.

stratagems.name: A DEADLY PRIZE
stratagems.when: Start of the Command phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
stratagems.effect: That objective marker is said to be Sabotaged, and remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. While an objective marker is Sabotaged and under your control, each time an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move within range of that objective marker, roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

stratagems.name: RAPID INGRESS
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One unit from your army that is in Reserves.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase, and if every model in that unit has the Deep Strike ability, you can set that unit up as described in the Deep Strike ability (even though it is not your Movement phase).
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive on the battlefield during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.

stratagems.name: ADAPTIVE TACTICS
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One DEATHWATCH unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Select the Furor Tactics, Malleus Tactics or Purgatus Tactics. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Deathwatch Mission Tactic is active for your unit instead of any other Deathwatch Mission Tactic that is active for your army, even if you have already selected that Deathwatch Mission Tactic this battle.

stratagems.name: LEONINE AGGRESSION
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTESADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army within 3" of one or more enemy units, or one DEATHWING unit from your army within 6" of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that only targets one or more of those enemy units, and you resolve that charge.
stratagems.restrictions: Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

stratagems.name: FIRE OVERWATCH
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, or declares a charge.
stratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase.
stratagems.effect: If that enemy unit is visible to your unit, your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase.
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot target a TITANIC unit with this Stratagem. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit, irrespective of the attacking weapon’s Ballistic Skill or any modifiers. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

stratagems.name: GRENADE
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One GRENADES unit from your army (excluding units that Advanced, Fell Back or have shot this turn) that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Select one GRENADES model in your unit and one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of any units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your GRENADES model. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.name: HEROIC INTERVENTION
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
stratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase.
stratagems.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase.
stratagems.restrictions: You can only select a VEHICLE unit from your army if it is a WALKER. Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

stratagems.name: COUNTER-OFFENSIVE
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has fought.
stratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Your unit fights next.
